column1: The Pit Room////So good! The crust on the brisket is a bit thick with pepper and smoky
column2: which I don't prefer. But a lot of people do
column3: and the meat underneath was very tender and not dry at all. Flavors were all so good. The elote is customizable
column4: the chicharones with hot sauce were excellent
column5: and you can sub them for a side! Next time I'm getting a separate order of them. The bread was homemade
column6: I'm pretty sure and excellent. Good selection of draft beer and various bottled drinks (also soda fountain
column8: lemonade and iced coffee dispensers). My favorite part was the pickle bar with pickled hot carrots
column12: and more sauces/fixings. Insanely good BBQ with a touch of taqueria. Will be back!
